message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You can have a smaller share, but I'll give you a chance to take it!
You're being greedy, Bob! I'll give you a slightly larger share, but don't think you're getting away with everything!
You're getting closer to a deal, Alice, but I'm not there yet!
I'm getting desperate, Bob! But I'm not giving up yet. You're getting closer, but I still want a better deal!
